Outside Studio
FRONTEND DEVELOPER
About The Company

Outside is a Kathmandu-based design & technology studio driving positive change for people and the planet.

Outside support purpose-driven companies and organizations with strategy, design, and technology solutions, and re-invest our profits into local community initiatives.

My Responsibilities
  • Slicing mockup files and maintaining designs as clients requirement. Modify and Updating pre-existing websites.
  • Maintaining and creating custom sections in shopify themes.
  • Create websites and modify themes in elementor, bakery builder, and other wordpress themes as per requirement.
  • Guide new interns and onboarding new team members, lead teams and project deliverly planning.
  • Creating resuable components and maining internal frontend library.
